Rochester.The Harley School:
The Harley School is a college preparatory, independent day school in Rochester, New York, United States.


== History ==
Founded in 1917, The Harley School was first called “The Children’s University School of Rochester.”


== Campus ==
The school is located in the suburb of Brighton. The 25-acre (10 ha) campus is composed of a main building housing all divisions, an athletic center known as the Fieldhouse, and The Commons.
